effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon
:   Evolves an eevee into vaporeon, a lombre into ludicolo, a panpour into simipour, a poliwhirl into poliwrath, a shellder into cloyster, or a staryu into starmie.
effect_entries.short_effect: Evolves an Eevee into Vaporeon, a Lombre into Ludicolo, a Panpour into Simipour, a Poliwhirl into Poliwrath, a Shellder into Cloyster, or a Staryu into Starmie.

flavor_text_entries.text:
ある　特定の　ポケモンを
進化させる　不思議な　石。
澄んだ　水色を　している。

A peculiar stone that can make
certain species of Pokémon evolve.
It is the blue of a pool of clear water.

Pietra particolare che fa evolvere determinate
specie di Pokémon. Ha delle macchioline azzurre.

Curiosa piedra que hace evolucionar a
determinadas especies de Pokémon. Es de
color azul.

Dieser spezielle Stein löst bei bestimmten
Pokémon die Entwicklung aus. Er ist hellblau.

Une pierre étrange qui fait évoluer certaines
espèces de Pokémon. Elle est de couleur bleue.

어느 특정 포켓몬을
진화시키는 이상한 돌.
투명한 푸른색을 띠고 있다.

ある　とくていの　ポケモンを
しんかさせる　ふしぎな　いし。
すんだ　みずいろを　している。

A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It is a clear, light blue.

A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It is a clear, light blue.

Une pierre étrange qui fait évoluer
certaines espèces de Pokémon.
Elle est de couleur bleue.

A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It is a clear, light blue.

species of Pokémon evolve.
It is a clear, light blue.

A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of Pokémon evolve.
It is a clear, light blue.

A peculiar stone that makes certain
species of POKéMON evolve.
It is a clear light blue.

Makes certain
species of POKéMON
evolve.
